name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Russell M. HESS III, Appellant

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., and SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD, McCAFFERY and GREENSPAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Russell M. HESS III, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been IMPROVIDENTLY GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Glenn D. Welsh, Esq., Amy Jo Shaffer, Esq., Berks County Public Defender’s Office, Pittsburgh, for Russell M. Hess, III.
Peter Rosalsky, Esq., Defender Association of Philadelphia, Philadelphia, for Defender Association of Philadelphia.
John T. Adams, Esq., Alisa Rebecca Hobart, Esq., for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
casebody.head_matter:
961 A.2d 108
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee v. Russell M. HESS III, Appellant.
